home.title: Personal Skill Map
home.subtitle: Discover your career path with AI-powered skill maps. Visualize the skills you need to master your dream career.
home.searchPlaceholder: Try "Software Engineer" or "I want to work remotely"

search.title: Search
search.description: Enter any career path you want to explore. Our AI understands thousands of roles.

generate.title: Generate
generate.description: AI generates a comprehensive skill map with all the skills you need to master.

track.title: Track
track.description: Visualize your progress as you unlock skills and level up your career.

home.footer: Built with Next.js, React Flow, and OpenAI.
home.footerPowered: Powered by AI skill map generation.

skillTreePreview.title: Visualize Your Path to Mastery
skillTreePreview.description: Our AI-generated skill maps provide a clear and intuitive roadmap for your career growth. See the connections between skills and understand what to learn next.

suggestions.title: Career Suggestions
suggestions.subtitle: Based on your preferences, here are some careers you might enjoy:

career.generatingSubtext: This may take a few seconds
career.saveDescription: Sign in to save your skill map progress and access it from anywhere. Without signing in, your progress will be lost when you leave this page.
career.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this skill map? This action cannot be undone.

dashboard.signInDescription: Please sign in to access your dashboard and track your skill progress.
dashboard.startDescription: Explore career paths and start tracking your skill progress. Your saved paths will appear here.
dashboard.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this skill map? This action cannot be undone.

auth.signInDescription: Sign in to track your skill progress
auth.termsNotice: By signing in, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

masterMap.title: Your Skill Universe
masterMap.subtitle: All your skills from every career path, intelligently merged
masterMap.emptyDescription: Start exploring career paths to build your personal skill universe. Each career you explore adds new skills to your collection.
masterMap.errorDescription: Something went wrong while loading your skill universe. Please try refreshing the page.
masterMap.helpText: Click on a career to view its full skill map. Scroll to zoom, drag to pan.

seo.title: Personal Skill Map - AI-Powered Career Skill Maps
seo.description: Discover and visualize your career path with AI-generated skill maps. Explore the skills you need to master your dream career.
seo.keywords: career skills, skill map, career path, AI learning, personal development, career growth, skill tree
seo.dashboardDescription: Track your skill progress and manage your career paths. View your personalized skill maps and learning journey.
seo.careerDescription: Explore the complete skill map for {career}. Discover the skills you need to master and track your progress.

skillGraph.sortTooltip: Re-arrange nodes in a neat layout

aiChat.title: AI Assistant
aiChat.welcomeMessage: Hi! I can help you customize your skill map. Try asking me to add skills, suggest what to learn next, or merge with another map.
aiChat.inputPlaceholder: Ask me to modify your skill map...
aiChat.readOnlyPlaceholder: Sign in to chat and modify this map
aiChat.errorMessage: Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again.
aiChat.previewDescription: The following changes will be applied to your skill map:
aiChat.mergeDescription: Combine two skill maps into one unified map
aiChat.selectMapToMerge: Select a map to merge with your current map:
aiChat.noOtherMaps: You don't have any other skill maps to merge with.
aiChat.errorLoadingMaps: Failed to load your maps. Please try again.
aiChat.errorMerging: Failed to merge maps. Please try again.
aiChat.mergeWarning: This will replace your current map with the merged version. You can undo this change.
aiChat.signInToApply: Sign in to apply these changes to your skill map.
